org.pmedv.cms.daos
Class AbstractDAO

java.lang.Object
  org.pmedv.cms.daos.AbstractDAO
Direct Known Subclasses:
AccountDAO, AppointmentDAO, AttachmentDAO, BaseDAO, BiblioDAO, CalendarDAO, CategoryDAO, ConfigDAO, ContactDAO, ContentDAO, CountryDAO, DownloadCategoryDAO, DownloadDAO, EventDAO, FaqDAO, FolderDAO, ForumDAO, GalleryDAO, ImageDAO, MeetingDAO, MessageDAO, NodeDAO, ParticipantDAO, PostingDAO, ProcessDAO, SiteRequestDAO, TemplateDAO, ThreadDAO, UserDAO, UsergroupDAO
public abstract class AbstractDAO
extends java.lang.Object

Basic abstract class for the hibernate persistence layer. This class provides basic access to a hibernate entity in pojo mode.

The following three abstract methods have to be implemented:

  • public abstract String getQueryAll()
  • public abstract String getQueryById()
  • public abstract String getQueryByName()

    • These three methods have to return a query String in HQL (Hibernate query language)

    Version:
    5.8.2006
    Author:
    Matthias Pueski
